subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Paul had 33 points, 12 assists and 9 rebounds to lead the host New Orleans Hornets to a 112-108 overtime victory last night against the Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: Chris Paul had 33 points, 12 assists and 9 rebounds to lead the host New Orleans Hornets to a 112-108 overtime victory last night against the Dallas Mavericks.
